title: Simplified Chinese showing up alongside traditional Chinese. System language is traditional Chinese.
content:
My Pixel XL (Pie) is set to Traditional Chinese (Taiwan). However, across a few apps, simplified Chinese characters will show up. However, this same issue may not show up on other Android phones. 

In the screenshot below, the circled stops are given in simplified Chinese. 

Is this a bug, or do I have locale settings wrong somewhere?

Thanks in advance!
